1.title: Courtyard
1.narrative: You step out into a large courtyard, surrounded by towering walls. In the center of the courtyard is a large fountain, its water glistening in the sunlight.

2.title: Kitchen
2.narrative: You enter a large kitchen, filled with the aroma of freshly baked bread and roasted meats. You can see several cooks busy at work, preparing a feast fit for a king.

5.title: Treasury

2.title: Dungeon Cell
2.narrative: You find yourself in a cold and damp cell. The walls are made of stone and the only light comes from a small window high up on the wall. You hear the faint sound of dripping water.
